decisionGuide.description: Use these prompts to identify the fastest starting point before you dig deeper.

studio.title: How Studio fits.
studio.description: Diagnostics and mechanisms guidance stay public. The Studio supports facilitation, co-delivery, or mediation when needed.
bullets: Escalate from any diagnostic readout to ethotechnics.com/studio when risk or ambiguity shows up.
Invite Studio partners to co-facilitate workshops using the same playbooks you see in the mechanisms catalog.
Use Studio engagements to trial a path, then fold the learnings back into the Institute releases.
